Citation.sTitle: Solubilities and enthalpies of solution of picric acid and picrates at 298.15K in DMF, EtOH and acetic acid
Citation.sAbstract: The enthalpies of solution of picric acid (PA) in DMF, EtOH and HOAc, potassium picrate (KPA) and Pb(PA)2*H2O (lead picrate) in DMF have  been determined by a calorimeter at 298.15 K. In addition, the solubilities of PA, KPA and Pb(PA)2*H2O in the solvents of DMF, EtOH, HOAc  and H2O are measured.
